errors.error_description: Referenced non-existent file paths for requirements.txt and settings template that don't exist in the project structure
correction_candidates: Remove file path references and use standard pip installation commands

Use relative paths like `requirements/base.txt` that match the actual project structure
Reference the actual documentation for installation instead of non-existent files
errors.golden_answer: Remove file path references and use standard pip installation commands
